thread.section_title: MiniInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 MiniInTheBox 的点评意见 | miniinthebox.com
thread.title: Sébastien Fournier
thread.title_full: MiniInTheBox 的点评人 Sébastien Fournier

author: Sébastien Fournier
title: Sébastien Fournier
text: MiniInTheBox is trustworthy and they truly stand-up to what they are: a place to get cool everyday gadgets at an awesome price and you always get a free shipping option. You might not find everything you're looking for but MiniInTheBox is definitely worth a try before heading to pricier online retail stores that only offer free shipping when you spend a decent amount of money.
